text: MV Nasrin-1 was a ferry that sunk in the Meghna River near Chandpur, Bangladesh, on the midnight of July 8, 2003. Of the 750 people on board 220 were rescued. ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * Category:Ferries of Bangladesh Category:Maritime incidents in Bangladesh Category:Shipwrecks in rivers Category:Maritime incidents in 2003 Category:2003 in Bangladesh
title: MV Nasrin-1
